rukus.text: 23|78|Teraemi tomalokara babe sraranasakti, drstisakti arau antarasamuha srsti karaiche; kintu tomaloke khube'i kama krtajnata prakasa karaa.
23|79|Teraemi tomalokaka prthiraita bistrta karaiche arau tomalokaka te'omra ocarate'i samabeta karaa ha’ba.
23|80|Teraemi jirana dana karae arau teraemi mrtyu pradana karae, te'omra adhikarate'i raati arau dinara paraibartana haya. Tathapi'o tomaloke buji noporaa ne
23|81|baram sihamte'o se'i kathake'i kaya yi katha sihamtara purbarartisakale kaichila.
23|82|Sihamte kaya, ‘yetiya ami mrtyubarana karaima arau ami mati o asthita parainata hama, tara pichato ami punaraut'thita hamane
23|83|‘arasye amaka arau itipurbe amara purbapurausasakalako ene dharanara pratisrauti diya haichila. Eya purbararti sakalara upakathara bahirae ana eko nahaya’.
23|84|Koraa, ‘prthirai arau iyata yi ache se'i sakalo(ra adhikara) kara? Yadi tomaloke jana (tente koraa)’.
23|85|Arasye sihamte ka’ba, ‘allahara’. Koraa, ‘tathapi'o tomaloke siksa grahana nakaraiba ne’
23|86|koraa, ‘sapta akasa arau maha arachara raba kona’
23|87|arasye sihamte ka’ba, ‘allaha’. Koraa, ‘tathapi'o tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraiba ne’
23|88|Koraa, ‘kara hatata sakalo bastura kartrtba? Yijane asraya dana karae athaca te'omra bipakse konorae'i kako asraya diba noraarae, yadi tomaloke jana (tente koraa)’.
23|89|Arasye sihamte ka’ba ‘allaha’. Koraa, ‘tente ka’ra paraa tomaloke yadugrasta haicha’
23|90|baram ami sihamtara ocarata satya lai ahicho; niscaya sihamta michaliya.

23|91|Allahe kono santana grahana karaa na'i, arau te'omra lagata ana kono ilaha'o na'i; yadi thakilehemtena tente pratyeka ilahe nija nija srstika lai prthaka hai ga’lehemtena arau ejane anajanara oparata praadhan'ya bistara karailehemtena. Sihamte allahara prati yibora araopa karae se'iborara paraa te'om ati paraitra ati mahana
23|92|gopana arau prakasya sakalo bisaye te'om jnata, eteke sihamte yi ansi karae tara paraa te'om bahu urd'dhata.
